xwikidoc.name: ApplicationSheet
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content: {{velocity}} #set($docextras = []) ## Export all the pages in a project for which the user has at least "view" access #if($request.export && $doc.hasAccessLevel('edit')) #if($request.singlePage) #set($xarNumber = 0) #set($pagesList = [$util.decodeURI($request.singlePage)]) #set($spacesList = []) #set($projectName = $xwiki.getDocument($util.decodeURI($request.singlePage)).name) #else #set($masterObjXar = $doc.getObject('WebIDECode.ApplicationClass')) #set($xarNumber = $masterObjXar.getProperty('xarVersion').value) #if("$!xarNumber" == "") #set($xarNumber = 0) #end #set($nextNumber = $xarNumber+1) #set($discard = $masterObjXar.set('xarVersion', $nextNumber)) #set($discard = $doc.save()) #set($masterObj = $doc.getObject('WebIDECode.ApplicationClass')) #set($pagesList = $masterObj.getProperty('pages').value) #set($spacesList = $masterObj.getProperty('spaces').value) #set($projectName = $masterObj.getProperty('projectName').value) #end #** * 1/ Get the list of spaces (check for potential subspaces first) * 2/ Merge all the pages from these spaces to the list of additional pages * 3/ Add all the pages from that merged list to the XAR *# ## 1/ Check for subspaces #set($nestedSpaces = false) #if($services.model.serialize($services.model.createDocumentReference("wiki", ["A", "B"], "page"), 'default') == 'wiki:A.B.page') #set($nestedSpaces = true) #end #set($spacesListNested = $sorttool.sort($spacesList)) #if($nestedSpaces) #foreach($space in $spacesList) #set($xwql = "select space.reference from XWikiSpace as space where space.parent=:space order by space.name") #set($spacePageList = $services.query.xwql($xwql).bindValue('space', $space).execute()) #foreach($i in [0..1000]) #if($i >= $spacePageList.size()) #break #end #set($addToList =[]) #set($discard = $finalList.add($spacePageList[$i])) #set($xwql = "select space.reference from XWikiSpace as space where space.parent=:space order by space.name") #set($addToList = $services.query.xwql($xwql).bindValue('space', $spacePageList[$i]).execute()) #foreach($item in $addToList) #set($discard = $spacePageList.add($item)) #end #end #foreach($spaceElement in $spacePageList) #if(!$spacesListNested.contains($spaceElement)) #set($discard = $spacesListNested.add($spaceElement)) #end #end #end #set($spacesListNested = $sorttool.sort($spacesListNested)) #end ## 2/ Merge pages from 'spaces' property and additionnal pages from 'pages' property #set($spacesListAdd = []) #foreach($space in $spacesListNested) #foreach($page in $xwiki.getSpaceDocsName($space)) #set($document = $xwiki.getDocument("$space.$page")) #if(!$pagesList.contains($document.fullName) && $document.hasAccessLevel('view')) #set($discard = $pagesList.add($document.fullName)) #end #end #end #set($pagesList = $sorttool.sort($pagesList)) ## 3/ Create the .xar #set($export = $xwiki.package) #set($discard = $export.setWithVersions(false)) #set($discard = $export.setLicence("LGPL")) #set($xarFullName = "${projectName}-${xarNumber}") #set($discard = $export.setName($xarFullName)) #foreach ($itemexp in $pagesList) $export.add($itemexp, 0) #end $export.export() #end #if($xcontext.action == "view") #set($codeSpace = $doc.codeSpace) #if("$!codeSpace" == "") #set($spacesList = []) #if("$!doc.spaces" != "") #set($ok = $spacesList.addAll($doc.spaces)) #end #if(!$spacesList.contains("${doc.name}Code")) #set($ok = $spacesList.add("${doc.name}Code")) #set($ok = $doc.getObject('WebIDECode.ApplicationClass').set('spaces', $spacesList)) #set($ok = $doc.save()) #end #end #set($showRightPanels = 0) #set($showLeftPanels = 0) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use("WebIDECode.ApplicationSheet")) #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use("WebIDECode.ApplicationSheet")) #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use("WebIDECode.ApplicationHierarchy")) #if($xwiki.exists("WebIDECode.RTWiki")) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use("WebIDECode.RTWiki")) #end #set($syntaxHState = '') ## Check the version of Syntax Highlighting installed, and load the custom JS if version > 2.1 #if($xwiki.exists('SyntaxHighlighting.ConfigurationClass')) #set($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use("WebIDECode.SyntaxHighlighting")) #set($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use("WebIDECode.SyntaxHighlighting")) #set($syntaxHState = 'new') #elseif($xwiki.exists('SyntaxHighlighting.SyntaxHighlighting')) #set($syntaxHState = 'old') #end (% id="editorBlock" %) ((( (% id="hierarchyBlock" %) ((( ))) (% id="displayBlock" class="editorElement editorViewElement" %) ((( image:WebIDECode.ApplicationSheet@XWebIDE.png Welcome to the XWiki WebIDE, you can use it to create, edit and export XWiki Applications. This is the Master Page of the project, it contains meta-data such as the list of Folders and Pages which are part of the project. #if("$!codeSpace" == "") {{error}} **Your code space is not defined**. It is the space where the global elements (JS, CSS, TRanslations, Macros...) will be placed when created from the logical view. You should choose your code space as soon as posible. Without code space specified, the pages will be placed in the space **${doc.name}Code** (that space has been added to your project) [[Change the code space>>path:$masterDoc.getURL('view', '#!XWebIDE')||data-space='$escapetool.url($doc.space).replace('+', '%20')' data-page='$escapetool.url($doc.name).replace('+', '%20')' data-rawtitle="$escapetool.url($doc.title).replace('+', '%20')" class='editObject']] {{/error}} #end __Get started__: * **Edit a page** in your project by clicking on one of the edit buttons in the lefthand panel - you can edit the page in different modes for editing the content and metadata * **Add a new folder** (also known as a Space) clicking the "add new" button on the left (Physical view) or the {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} in the "Pages" category (Logical view) * **Add a new page** when you need to create a new empty page clicking on the {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} in the selected folder * **Add an existing page** for times when you need to add a page which must be in a Space which is not part of your application's code * **Export your project** as a XWiki .xar file which can be imported to other wikis or published on extensions.xwiki.org. __Shortcuts for the wiki and object editors__: * **Save & View** : Alt + S * **Save & Continue** : Alt + Shift + S * **Discard & View** : Alt + C * **View in a new tab** : Alt + Shift + C __Shortcuts in XWiki__: * **Open the Web IDE in the current page** : W __Improve your IDE Experience__: By installing the additional extensions you can improve the user interface of the XWiki WebIDE. To do so, use the [[Extension Manager>>XWiki.XWikiPreferences||queryString="editor=globaladmin§ion=XWiki.AddExtensions"]]. * Install the [[Syntax Highlighting extension>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Syntax+Highlighting+Application]] * Install the [[Auto-Completion extension>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/AutoCompletion+Application]] To learn about other features of the XWiki WebIDE, see the [[Online Documentation>>http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/XWebIDE+Application]] on xwiki.org. ))) (% id='editorTabBar' class='leftmenu2 editorElement editorEditElement' %)((())) (% id="contentMainBlock" class="editorElement editorEditElement" %) ((( ))) (% id="hierarchyBottomActionsBar" class="editorElement editorEditElement" %) ((( {{html clean=false}} {{/html}} ))) ))) (% id="editorCrossIcon" class="editorIcon"%)((((% class="editorTabButtonCross"%){{html clean='false'}}{{/html}}))) (% id="editorWikiIcon" class="editorIcon"%)((({{html clean='false'}}{{/html}}))) (% id="editorObjectIcon" class="editorIcon"%)((({{html clean='false'}}{{/html}}))) (% id="editorAwmIcon" class="editorIcon"%)((({{html clean='false'}}{{/html}}))) {{html clean="false"}}{{/html}} #end {{/velocity}}
